    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2687</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A visual module of the earth's four spheres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Sichtmodul der vier Bereiche der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un module visuel des quatre sphères de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um módulo visual das quatro esferas da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un modulo visivo delle quattro sfere della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια οπτική ενότητα των γήινων τεσσάρων σφαιρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un módulo visual de las cuatro esferas de la 
tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This animation demostrates the four spheres of the earth : geosphere, biosphere, hydrosphere and atmosphere</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmoshoere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Animation demostrates die vier Bereiche der
Masse: geosphere, Biosphäre, Hydrosphere und Atmosphäre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demostrates de cette animation les quatre 
sphères de la terre : geosphere, biosphère, hydrosphère et 
atmosphère</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demostrates deste animation as quatro esferas da 
terra: geosphere, biosphere, hydrosphere e atmosfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Demostrates di questa animazione le quattro sfere
della terra: geosphere, biosfera, hydrosphere ed atmosfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ζωτικότητα demostrates οι τέσσερις σφαίρες 
της γης: geosphere, βιόσφαιρα, υδρόσφαιρα και ατμόσφαιρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostrates de esta animación las cuatro esferas
de la tierra: geosphere, biosfera, hidrosfera y atmósfera</string>
          </description>
